docsTags.name: description
docsTags.text: An accordion is a vertically stacked list of headers that reveal or hide associated sections of content.

docsTags.name: example
docsTags.text:
<goat-accordion>
<goat-accordion-item heading="Title 1"><goat-text>The accordion component delivers large amounts of content in a small space through progressive disclosure. The user gets key details about the underlying content and can choose to expand that content within the constraints of the accordion. Accordions work especially well on mobile interfaces or whenever vertical space is at a premium.</goat-text></goat-accordion-item>
</goat-accordion>

metadata.name: Accordion
metadata.description: An accordion is a vertically stacked list of headers that reveal or hide associated sections of content.
metadata.example:
<goat-accordion>
<goat-accordion-item heading="Title 1"><goat-text>The accordion component delivers large amounts of content in a small space through progressive disclosure. The user gets key details about the underlying content and can choose to expand that content within the constraints of the accordion. Accordions work especially well on mobile interfaces or whenever vertical space is at a premium.</goat-text></goat-accordion-item>
</goat-accordion>

docsTags.name: description
docsTags.text: An interactive button with a range of presentation options.

props.name: block
props.docs: If true, fits button width to its parent width. Defaults to `false`.

props.name: disabled
props.docs: If true, the user cannot interact with the button. Defaults to `false`.

props.name: href
props.docs: Hyperlink to navigate to on click.

props.name: icon
props.docs:
Icon which will displayed on button.
Possible values are bootstrap icon names.

props.name: iconEnd
props.docs: Icon position.

props.name: selected
props.docs: Button selection state.

props.name: showLoader
props.docs: Show loader.

props.name: size
props.docs:
Button size.
Possible values are `"sm"`, `"md"`, `"lg"`, `"xl"`, `"xxl"`, `"none"`. Defaults to `"md"`.

props.name: target
props.docs: Sets or retrieves the window or frame at which to target content.

props.name: variant
props.docs:
Button variants.
Possible values are `"default"`, `"light"`, `"outline"`, `"ghost"`, `"link"`. Defaults to `"default"`.

methods.name: setBlur
methods.docs:
Sets blur on the native `button` in `goat-button`. Use this method instead of the global
`button.blur()`.

methods.name: setFocus
methods.docs:
Sets focus on the native `button` in `goat-button`. Use this method instead of the global
`button.focus()`.

events.docs: On click of button, a CustomEvent 'goat:click' will be triggered.

docsTags.name: description
docsTags.text: An accordion is a vertically stacked list of headers that reveal or hide associated sections of content.

docsTags.name: example
docsTags.text:
<goat-accordion>
<goat-accordion-item heading="Title 1"><goat-text>The accordion component delivers large amounts of content in a small space through progressive disclosure. The user gets key details about the underlying content and can choose to expand that content within the constraints of the accordion. Accordions work especially well on mobile interfaces or whenever vertical space is at a premium.</goat-text></goat-accordion-item>
</goat-accordion>

metadata.name: Accordion
metadata.description: An accordion is a vertically stacked list of headers that reveal or hide associated sections of content.
metadata.example:
<goat-accordion>
<goat-accordion-item heading="Title 1"><goat-text>The accordion component delivers large amounts of content in a small space through progressive disclosure. The user gets key details about the underlying content and can choose to expand that content within the constraints of the accordion. Accordions work especially well on mobile interfaces or whenever vertical space is at a premium.</goat-text></goat-accordion-item>
</goat-accordion>
